titleInfo.title: National Jewish Hospital's Board of Trustees

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope:''#106 Board of Trustees, NJH''. On first additional sheet: '' #106 Board of Trustees of National Jewish Hospital, date unknown. Donor American Jewish Archives Row 1 - bottom from left Row 1, #1, # 2 Wm. S. Friedman, #3, #4, #5 Dr. Robert Levy; Row 2, #1 Samuel Kohn, #2, #3 Samuel Grimes, #4, #5; Row #3, #1 Michael Baum, #2, #3, #4, #5 Morris Cohen, Row # 4; #1 Dr. Adelman, #2, #3 David Harlem.'' On second additional sheet: ''Board of Trustees of National Jewish Hospital donor -- American Jewish Archives; Row 1-Bottom to Top; ?1. M.B. Barnett, 2. Sam Cohen, 3. Michael Baum; Row 2-Bottom to Top; 1. Rabbi William Friedman, ?2., ?3., 4. Dr. Adelman; Row 3-Bottom to Top; ?1., ?2. Sam Grimes, ?3., ?4., 5. Morris Cohen; Row 4-Bottom to Top; ?1. Arthur Friedman, ?2. Sam Fleisher, ?3., 4. David Harlem; Row 5-Bottom to Top; ?1., 2. Dr. Robert Levy, ?3.''

mods.abstract: Portrait of National Jewish Hospital's Board of Trustees stands on steps of an unidentified building, which was probably located on the hospital's campus. First row left to right: M. D. Barnett, Rabbi William Friedman, two unidentified men, and Dr. Robert Levy. Second row left to right: Sam Cohen, Ernest Morris, Sam Grimes, Sam Fleisher, and Arthur Friedman. Row 3 left to right: Michael Baum, three unidentified men, and Morris Cohen. Row 4 left to right: Dr. Adelman, an unidentified man, and David Harlem.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
